Class OthelloGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • OthelloGame

  • public class OthelloGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Plays Othello/Reversi against computer with a alpha-beta search.
    Author:
    T.Sergeant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OthelloGame()
      Create a new game with human vs human, verbose output, and random start.
      OthelloGame(int p1type, int p2type)
      Create a new game with specified types of players, verbose output, and random start.
      OthelloGame(int p1type, int p2type, boolean verbose, int start)
      Creates a new game betwen the specified player types.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • OthelloGame

        public OthelloGame()
        Create a new game with human vs human, verbose output, and random start.

      • OthelloGame

        public OthelloGame(int p1type,
           int p2type)
        Create a new game with specified types of players, verbose output, and random start.
        Parameters:
        p1type - type of player 1
        p2type - type of player 2

      • OthelloGame

        public OthelloGame(int p1type,
           int p2type,
           boolean verbose,
           int start)
        Creates a new game betwen the specified player types.
        Parameters:
        p1type - type of player 1
        p2type - type of player 2
        verbose - generates lots of output if true
        start - who should start (-1 for random, 0, or 1)

        See createPlayer() for documention about player types.
